br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.cards.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Effect, Fighter, Trap

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json.Serializable
    Template for the behavior of the cards on the field. This class only concerns itself with the logic aspects of the card, not data.

        protected int direction
        Specifies the card's orientation and which player it belongs to. 1 - The card moves to the right and belongs to the human player. -1 - The card moves to the left and belongs to the machine player.

        protected int lane

      • readyToSummom

        public boolean readyToSummom(BattlePlatform platform)
        Verifies if a card is ready to summon based on its preRequisites
        Parameters:
        platform - Gathers the current data of the battle
        Returns:
        true: the card can be summoned right now false: the card can't be summoned right now
